Articles.Content:
Could I get official clarification on why Skunky is streaming with MechJeb? MaxMaps had already confirmed that only community streams would be run with mods, and that the official streams would be done with stock, since "that is what a new player is going to be seeing".

Should Captain Skunky, an employee and therefore one of Squad's streamers, not be streaming without mods (with the exception being Kethane, which he is cowering for the stream). Misleading comments will only lead to situations like these, and I think everyone would like some clarification on this.

(I have no problem with MechJeb itself, just that one of the official streamers is going against the policy we've already been told would be in place.)
Please not you satcharna...does it really matter?

Please not you satcharna...does it really matter?
(I have no problem with MechJeb itself, just that one of the official streamers is going against the policy we've already been told would be in place.)
Please read my post before jumping to conclusions.
Yes but there where always mods on the stream.

But it was confirmed that official Squad streamers, such as their employees, such as Skunky, would stream the game without mods. Both to avoid the drama unfolding on both the stream and KSPG, and to show new players what the stock game is like. The community streamers would be allowed to continue using mods. Please inform yourself on the subject before making further comments, Canopus.
Mods are banning anyone who says the word MechJeb. Wow.

Mods are banning anyone who says the word MechJeb. Wow.
It serves them right.
what is the link for the KSPTV channel?

what is the link for the KSPTV channel?
http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv

http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv

thx, for the link.

It serves them right.

I don't think that's very fair. Is it so wrong to ask that an official representative of the game show off how it works without mod assistance?
The streaming process is pretty dynamic and things change last minute, we'll just have to leave it at that for the moment, guys. Thanks for understanding.

We understand that some people do not like MechJeb, but if a player chooses to use it, that is up to them.

As MechJeb discussions always deteriorate at an alarming rate, I shall close this one here
